kv9.10:1.10.pli: sacittakassa kāyakammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.10:2.7.pli: Hañci āvaṭṭentassa kāyakammaṃ …pe… paṇidahantassa kāyakammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.10:3.3.pli: Nanu kāyakammaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ cittena sahajātaṃ cittena saha ekuppādanti?

kv9.10:3.5.pli: Hañci kāyakammaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ cittena sahajātaṃ cittena saha ekuppādaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.10:4.3.pli: Na abhikkamitukāmo abhikkamati, na paṭikkamitukāmo paṭikkamati, na āloketukāmo āloketi, na viloketukāmo viloketi, na samiñjitukāmo samiñjeti, na pasāretukāmo pasāretīti?

kv9.10:4.5.pli: Nanu abhikkamitukāmo abhikkamati, paṭikkamitukāmo paṭikkamati, āloketukāmo āloketi, viloketukāmo viloketi, samiñjitukāmo samiñjeti, pasāretukāmo pasāretīti?

kv9.10:4.8.pli: pasāretukāmo pasāreti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.10:5.4.pli: Nanu atthi koci “aññatra gacchissāmī”ti aññatra gacchati …pe…

kv9.10:5.7.pli: Hañci atthi koci “aññatra gacchissāmī”ti aññatra gacchati …pe…

kv9.10:5.8.pli: “aññaṃ pasāressāmī”ti aññaṃ pasāreti, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv9.11:1.3.pli: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv9.11:1.5.pli: Hañci atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.11:2.3.pli: Nanu anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv9.11:2.5.pli: Hañci anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.11:3.1.pli: Atītena rūpakkhandhena samannāgato, anāgatena rūpakkhandhena samannāgato, paccuppannena rūpakkhandhena samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:3.5.pli: atītehi pañcahi khandhehi samannāgato, anāgatehi pañcahi khandhehi samannāgato, paccuppannehi pañcahi khandhehi samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:4.1.pli: Atītena cakkhāyatanena samannāgato, anāgatena cakkhāyatanena samannāgato, paccuppannena cakkhāyatanena samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:4.5.pli: atītehi dvādasahi āyatanehi samannāgato, anāgatehi dvādasahi āyatanehi samannāgato, paccuppannehi dvādasahi āyatanehi samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:5.1.pli: Atītāya cakkhudhātuyā samannāgato, anāgatāya cakkhudhātuyā samannāgato, paccuppannāya cakkhudhātuyā samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:5.5.pli: atītāhi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi samannāgato, anāgatāhi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi samannāgato, paccuppannāhi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:6.1.pli: Atītena cakkhundriyena samannāgato, anāgatena cakkhundriyena samannāgato, paccuppannena cakkhundriyena samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:6.5.pli: atītehi bāvīsatindriyehi samannāgato, anāgatehi bāvīsatindriyehi samannāgato, paccuppannehi bāvīsatindriyehi samannāgatoti?

kv9.11:7.4.pli: Nanu atthi aṭṭhavimokkhajhāyī catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ nikāmalābhī navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnaṃ lābhīti?

kv9.11:7.6.pli: Hañci atthi aṭṭhavimokkhajhāyī catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ nikāmalābhī navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv9.11:8.1.pli: Ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ, amatārammaṇaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, anusayā anārammaṇā, evamevaṃ ñāṇaṃ, atītānāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ, sabbaso vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphāro saddo, na yathācittassa vācā, tatheva kāyakammaṃ atītānāgatehi samannāgatoti.

kv9.2:1.3.pli: Amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ oghaniyaṃ yoganiyaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ upādāniyaṃ saṅkilesiyanti?

kv9.2:1.7.pli: Hañci amataṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ …pe… asaṅkilesiyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.2:2.3.pli: Amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?

kv9.2:2.5.pli: nanu amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?

kv9.2:2.7.pli: Hañci amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.2:3.5.pli: nanu amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?

kv9.2:3.7.pli: Hañci amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.2:4.3.pli: Amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññānirodhiyaṃ vighātapakkhiyaṃ anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:4.5.pli: nanu amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ na acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññābuddhiyaṃ avighātapakkhiyaṃ nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:4.7.pli: Hañci amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe…

kv9.2:4.8.pli: nibbānasaṃvattaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.2:5.1.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ …pe… saṅkilesiyanti?

kv9.2:5.3.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ …pe… saṅkilesiyanti?

kv9.2:6.1.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?

kv9.2:6.3.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ …pe… mucchaniyanti?

kv9.2:7.1.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?

kv9.2:7.3.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?

kv9.2:8.1.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:8.3.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:9.1.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ anoghaniyaṃ ayoganiyaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ anupādāniyaṃ asaṅkilesiyanti?

kv9.2:9.3.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ …pe… asaṅkilesiyanti?

kv9.2:10.1.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?

kv9.2:10.3.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ …pe…

kv9.2:11.1.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?

kv9.2:11.3.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?

kv9.2:12.1.pli: Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:12.3.pli: Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?

kv9.2:13.5.pli: “nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti, nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānitvā nibbānaṃ maññati, nibbānasmiṃ maññati, nibbānato maññati, nibbānaṃ meti maññati, nibbānaṃ abhinandatī”ti.

kv9.3:1.3.pli: Atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:1.5.pli: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:1.7.pli: Hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.3:2.1.pli: Phasso sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:2.3.pli: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:3.2.pli: saññā cetanā cittaṃ saddhā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi paññā rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ …pe…

kv9.3:3.3.pli: anottappaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:3.5.pli: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:4.1.pli: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:4.3.pli: Phasso sārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:5.1.pli: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:5.4.pli: anottappaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.3:6.6.pli: Hañci rūpaṃ sappaccayaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv9.4:2.3.pli: Kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.4:2.5.pli: kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ sārammaṇanti?

kv9.4:5.1.pli: Kāmarāgānusayo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno anārammaṇo, kāmarāgo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno sārammaṇoti?

kv9.4:5.7.pli: Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ekadeso sārammaṇo ekadeso anārammaṇoti?

kv9.4:6.1.pli: Paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo anārammaṇoti?

kv9.4:6.3.pli: Avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.4:9.1.pli: Avijjānusayo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno anārammaṇo, avijjā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā sārammaṇāti?

kv9.4:9.7.pli: Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ekadeso sārammaṇo ekadeso anārammaṇoti?

kv9.4:10.4.pli: Puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne sānusayoti vattabboti?

kv9.4:10.9.pli: Puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne sarāgoti vattabboti?

kv9.5:1.8.pli: Paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo anārammaṇoti?

kv9.5:1.10.pli: paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo sārammaṇoti?

kv9.5:3.1.pli: Ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, paññā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā sārammaṇāti?

kv9.5:3.7.pli: Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ekadeso sārammaṇo ekadeso anārammaṇoti?

kv9.6:1.5.pli: Hañci atītārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:1.8.pli: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:2.3.pli: Nanu atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.6:2.5.pli: Hañci atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:3.5.pli: Hañci anāgatārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:3.8.pli: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:4.3.pli: Nanu anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv9.6:4.5.pli: Hañci anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.6:5.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:5.3.pli: Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:5.5.pli: paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:5.7.pli: Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:6.1.pli: Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:6.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:7.1.pli: Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:7.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?

kv9.6:8.6.pli: Hañci atītānāgataṃ natthi, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv9.7:1.3.pli: Sabbaṃ cittaṃ vicārānupatitaṃ pītānupatitaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ somanassānupatitaṃ domanassānupatitaṃ upekkhānupatitaṃ saddhānupatitaṃ vīriyānupatitaṃ satānupatitaṃ samādhānupatitaṃ paññānupatitaṃ rāgānupatitaṃ dosānupatitaṃ …pe…

kv9.7:2.5.pli: Hañci atthi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.7:3.5.pli: Hañci atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.7:3.10.pli: “savitakko savicāro samādhi, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhī”ti?

kv9.7:3.13.pli: savitakko savicāro samādhi, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.8:1.3.pli: Sabbaso phusayato phassavipphāro saddo, sabbaso vedayato vedanāvipphāro saddo, sabbaso sañjānato saññāvipphāro saddo, sabbaso cetayato cetanāvipphāro saddo, sabbaso cintayato cittavipphāro saddo, sabbaso sarato sativipphāro saddo, sabbaso pajānato paññāvipphāro saddoti?

kv9.8:2.3.pli: Vitakkavipphāro saddo sotaviññeyyo sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?

kv9.8:2.5.pli: Nanu vitakkavipphāro saddo na sotaviññeyyo na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?

kv9.8:2.7.pli: Hañci vitakkavipphāro saddo na sotaviññeyyo na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.9:1.3.pli: Aphassakassa vācā avedanakassa vācā asaññakassa vācā acetanakassa vācā acittakassa vācāti?

kv9.9:1.5.pli: nanu saphassakassa vācā savedanakassa vācā sasaññakassa vācā sacetanakassa vācā sacittakassa vācāti?

kv9.9:1.8.pli: sacittakassa vācā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.9:2.6.pli: nanu āvaṭṭentassa vācā ābhogassa vācā …pe… paṇidahantassa vācāti?

kv9.9:2.8.pli: Hañci āvaṭṭentassa vācā ābhogassa vācā paṇidahantassa vācā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.9:3.3.pli: Nanu vācā cittasamuṭṭhānā cittena sahajātā cittena saha ekuppādāti?

kv9.9:3.5.pli: Hañci vācā cittasamuṭṭhānā cittena sahajātā cittena saha ekuppādā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.9:4.3.pli: Na bhaṇitukāmo bhaṇati, na kathetukāmo katheti, na ālapitukāmo ālapati, na voharitukāmo voharatīti?

kv9.9:4.5.pli: nanu bhaṇitukāmo bhaṇati, kathetukāmo katheti, ālapitukāmo ālapati, voharitukāmo voharatīti?

kv9.9:4.7.pli: Hañci bhaṇitukāmo bhaṇati, kathetukāmo katheti, ālapitukāmo ālapati, voharitukāmo voharati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv9.9:5.4.pli: Nanu atthi koci “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇati, “aññaṃ kathessāmī”ti aññaṃ katheti, “aññaṃ ālapissāmī”ti aññaṃ ālapati, “aññaṃ voharissāmī”ti aññaṃ voharatīti?

kv9.9:5.6.pli: Hañci atthi koci “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇati …pe…

kv9.9:5.7.pli: “aññaṃ voharissāmī”ti aññaṃ voharati, tena vata re vattabbe—
